title: Disable Content Selection with CSS
description: In this lab, we will dive into CSS programming and explore the user-select property. This lab aims to teach you how to disable selection of certain elements in your web page, which can be useful in preventing users from copying content. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to use the user-select property and its impact on web design.

meta.title: CSS Programming | User-Select | Web Design
meta.description: Explore the CSS user-select property and learn how to disable content selection on your web pages. Improve web design and prevent content copying.
meta.keywords: CSS, user-select, web design, content protection, web development
